title: Win a trip to Italy plus the latest ski gear
text: Sitting in the shadow of Mont Blanc, the charming resort of Courmayeur in Italy has a traditional mountain village atmosphere as well as access to the extensive Aosta Valley ski area and great après. A popular short-break destination, just an hour and a half from Geneva airport, Courmayeur is the perfect resort for a winter weekend getaway. With 40km of its own pistes and connections to the rest of Aosta’s 800km of slopes, there’s plenty to explore no matter how long your stay. Ski Solutions , the tailor-made winter sports tour operator, is offering you the chance to win a holiday for two to Courmayeur plus the latest ski gear courtesy of Eider and Ellis Brigham . The prize includes a four-night bed and breakfast stay, flights from London to Geneva and transfers, plus a bundle of clothing for each person including jacket and trousers from Eider as well as base layers, goggles, hat, gloves and socks from Ellis Brigham. The closing date for entries is midnight on November 3 2015. Terms and conditions apply. Online Form - Win a trip to Italy plus the latest ski gear Telegraphtravel Follow @telegraphtravel
